achievements.description: Achieve level 30 as a hero mentored by Batman

achievements.name: The Joker in the Deck

achievements.name: The Healing Touch
achievements.description: Achieve level 10 and gain the Healer Role

achievements.name: Aerial Antics
achievements.description: Achieve level 30 with an Aerial movement mode

achievements.name: Criminal Mastermind
achievements.description: Achieve level 30 as a villain mentored by Lex Luthor

achievements.name: Champion of Earth
achievements.description: Achieve level 30 as a hero mentored by Superman

achievements.name: Agile Ace
achievements.description: Achieve level 30 with an Agile movement mode

achievements.name: Warrior of Truth
achievements.description: Achieve level 30 as a hero mentored by Wonder Woman

achievements.name: Parole Denied
achievements.description: Defeat Red Lantern Vice, Yellow Lantern Lyssa Drak and Evil Star in the Oan Sciencells

achievements.name: Parole Granted
achievements.description: Defeat Red Lantern Vice, Green Lantern Guy Gardner and Evil Star in the Oan Sciencells

achievements.name: Not that Repulsive
achievements.description: Defeat Vice in the Coast City Duo without restarting the repulsor

achievements.name: Intergalactic Planetary
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Sector Agent set

achievements.name: Planetary Intergalactic
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Sector Incendiary set

achievements.name: Willpower Outage
achievements.description: Defeat the Scion of Will before the Sliceclaws power it up

achievements.name: Illogical Reasoning
achievements.description: Beat the Final Confrontation as a villain without using any Logic Batteries within the Hangar at Ferris Aircraft in Coast City

achievements.name: Low Battery
achievements.description: Beat the Final Confrontation as a hero without using any Logic Batteries within the Hangar at Ferris Aircraft in Coast City

achievements.name: Conviction
achievements.description: Complete Oan Sciencells without being knocked out

achievements.name: Fight for the Light
achievements.description: Complete Coast City Duo, STAR Labs Alert, Coast City Alert and Oan Sciencells Alert

achievements.name: Rogues' Gallery
achievements.description: Complete all of the Rogues' Wanted Posters

achievements.name: Crash of the Titans
achievements.description: Complete all of the Titans' Bounties

achievements.name: Two Tickets to Paradox
achievements.description: Seal both types of Massive Speed Force Ruptures

achievements.name: Prime Timeline
achievements.description: Complete the Massive Speed Force Rupture Event

achievements.name: Reap the Rewards
achievements.description: Defeat 100 Paradox Reapers in Central City

achievements.name: Play On
achievements.description: Complete the Cosmic Treadmill: Flashback Duo without destroying any Sonic Emitters

achievements.name: For My Next Trick!
achievements.description: Defeat Abra Kadabra while all the Riot-Bots are active without being knocked out

achievements.name: Quickly, Into the Past
achievements.description: Complete the Cosmic Treadmill: Flashback Duo in under 7 minutes

achievements.name: They Used to be Adventurers
achievements.description: Ensure all three Colossal Archers reach the front lines at the Paradise Court battle in the Themyscira: The Gates of Tartarus raid

achievements.name: Olympian
achievements.description: Complete the Themyscira: The Gates of Tartarus raid in 20 minutes or less

achievements.name: Prime Numbers
achievements.description: Defeat all three Prime Avatars without destroying any of the Brainiac Spawners

achievements.name: In Prime Time
achievements.description: Finish the Prime Battleground Raid in 15 minutes or less

achievements.name: Bottle Opener
achievements.description: Complete 250 Battle for Earth Duos

achievements.name: Guilty On All Charges
achievements.description: Allow all Sentences to run their full course when fighting the Supreme Justice in the South Gotham Courthouse Alert

achievements.name: Timely Closing Arguments
achievements.description: Defeat the Prosecutor and Defense Attorney within 10 seconds of each other in the South Gotham Courthouse Alert

achievements.name: Jury Tampering
achievements.description: Stack the jury with 12 humans, not allowing any Brainiac Jurors to be transported to the Bailiff in the South Gotham Courthouse Alert

achievements.name: Uncover the Truth
achievements.description: Complete all of the Collections, Briefings, and Investigations available in the Battle for Earth DLC

achievements.name: Let's Get a Rally Going!
achievements.description: Rally 50 iconic allies in Assault: Headquarters arena matches

achievements.name: Making a Name for Yourself
achievements.description: Knock out 50 iconic enemies in Assault: Headquarters arena matches

achievements.name: Putting the Safe Back in Safehouse
achievements.description: Win 100 Assault: City Safehouses arena matches

achievements.name: Space Invader
achievements.description: Unlock Ursa, Power Girl, Amon Sur and Kilowog Legendary Battle Arena Avatars

achievements.name: The Armor Makes the Man
achievements.description: Collect all styles for the Knight PvP Battlesuit

achievements.name: Knight Moves
achievements.description: Collect a complete Checkmate PvP Battlesuit

achievements.name: Together We Stand
achievements.description: Complete the Assault: Headquarters arena match without letting any iconic allies get knocked out

achievements.name: This House is Clean
achievements.description: Complete the feats: My Life as a Robot, Hostage Negotiator, and Spacial Delivery

achievements.name: Not Even a Scratch
achievements.description: Defeat Ra's al Ghul in the Unpaid Dues operation without allowing Felix Faust to take any damage

achievements.name: A Soul Beating
achievements.description: Defeat the Fused Soul at the end of the Soul Alchemy operation in 3 minutes or less

achievements.name: Organic Gardening
achievements.description: Defeat Swamp Thing in the Seeds of Rot operation without destroying any Children of Nature seed pods

achievements.name: No Bedtime for Bozo
achievements.description: Defeat Tala before the Bumbler Hellthrall is knocked out during the Black Dawn operation

achievements.name: Fate in the Balance
achievements.description: Complete the wave event at the start of the Wayward Souls operation without letting Doctor Fate get knocked out

achievements.name: How to Train Your Wizard
achievements.description: Unlock the Doctor Fate and Felix Faust Legend Battle Avatars

achievements.name: Runes to My Memory
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Runes of the Norsemen set

achievements.name: Spirited Defense
achievements.description: Complete the With a Vengeance operation without letting any spirits disrupt the summoning circle

achievements.name: Riot Squad
achievements.description: Complete all of the exterior missions at Stryker's Island

achievements.name: Ace Chemicals Ace
achievements.description: Complete all of the exterior missions at Ace Chemicals

achievements.name: A Fistful of Arkham
achievements.description: Complete all of the exterior missions at Arkham Island

achievements.name: Factory Direct
achievements.description: Complete all of the exterior missions at Steelworks

achievements.name: Interior Designer
achievements.description: Unlock Free Placement Mode

achievements.name: It's a Shutout!
achievements.description: Win 5 consecutive Lair PvP Battles without letting your opponents win a single round

achievements.name: All Their Base
achievements.description: Win 1000 Lair PvP Battles

achievements.name: The World of Fashion
achievements.description: Complete the feats: I Can HAZMAT, Don't Pick Up Hitchhikers, Lost and Foundry, and Maximum Security

achievements.name: 25th Century Model
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Time Traveler set

achievements.name: Missiles Missed
achievements.description: Complete the iconic boss fight inside Wayne Tower without anyone being hit by the missile barrage

achievements.name: Volatile Hostiles
achievements.description: Defeat the Nexus Omega Drone inside the Nexus of Reality without allowing any Volatile Robots to explode

achievements.name: Leave Them
achievements.description: Defeat Jor-El on Krypton without defeating any of the House of El reinforcements

achievements.name: Silent Hunter
achievements.description: Disable three control panels in the Iconic Anomaly: The Hunt solo instance without alerting any mobsters

achievements.name: Controlled Collateral Damage
achievements.description: Complete the Iconic Anomaly: Test Subject #1 solo instance without any scientists getting knocked out

achievements.name: An Epic Odyssey
achievements.description: Defeat the Paradox Tyrant in the Paradox Wave raid without closing any of the Speed Force tunnels

achievements.name: High Hopes
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Exalted set

achievements.name: Power Corrupts
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Corrupted set

achievements.name: Blood Brothers
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Blood-Cursed set

achievements.name: Pride and Joy
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Prideful set

achievements.name: Not What I Ordered
achievements.description: Defeat 19 Primeval Demons summoned from a botched Envy ritual in the Knightsdome area of the Gotham Wastelands

achievements.name: Fallen Idols
achievements.description: Destroy 3 Jacob Idols in the Amusement Mile area of the Gotham Wastelands without defeating any of the civilian worshippers

achievements.name: Evermore
achievements.description: Complete the Take Pride mission 14 times

achievements.name: Multitude of Sins
achievements.description: Defeat Jack, James, or Julius 17 times in the Sons of Trigon Duos

achievements.name: Beware My Power
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Scion of Ion set

achievements.name: Burn Like My Power
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Disciple of Parallax set

achievements.name: No Mistake
achievements.description: During the Mist Recovery operation, complete the events in New S.T.A.R. Labs without allowing the enemy to take any of the mist containers

achievements.name: Don't Get Mad, Get Even
achievements.description: Defeat the Agitated Pulsar SL-1 trooper 17 times in the Downtown Metropolis Battlezone

achievements.name: You Conduit to it!
achievements.description: Destroy the conduits in the final battle of the Assault and Battery operation before they can become active

achievements.name: Explosive Denial
achievements.description: During the Lantern Strike Team operation, defeat the first boss without allowing any of the explosives to detonate

achievements.name: I Got This
achievements.description: During the final fight in the Iconic Vision: Aegis of Truth solo instance, allow your Amazon allies to rest and do not rally them

achievements.name: Temple of Boom
achievements.description: Defeat each of the Temple Guardians in the Iconic Vision: Aegis of Truth solo instance

achievements.name: One Woman Army
achievements.description: Complete the Iconic Vision: Circe's Trial solo instance without using her Legends loadout pet powers: Summon: Bestiamorph Berserker, Mirror Image

achievements.name: Witch Trial
achievements.description: Complete the Iconic Vision: Circe's Trial solo instance once without activating her deceptions, and once after activating all of them

achievements.name: Ruffling Feathers
achievements.description: While on the Flock, Stock, and Barrel mission in Gotham Under Siege, defeat 150 airborne enemies using a ballista

achievements.name: Don't Go Ballistic
achievements.description: Defeat the final boss in the Port of Paradise duo without using the ballistae

achievements.name: Keep It Safe
achievements.description: Pick up the crate at the start of the Themyscira Supply Lines duo and deliver it safely to the docks -- you must protect it with your life!

achievements.name: Corner the Market
achievements.description: During the Themyscira Divided alert, do not allow any of the bazaars in the Merchant Quarter to be retaken by the enemy

achievements.name: Lead By Example
achievements.description: Collect all styles in the Amazon Strategos set

achievements.name: Dregg or Alive
achievements.description: Defeat 450 Dregg Warriors, Dregg Berserkers, Dregg Seers, or Dregg Huskarls

achievements.name: No Eggscape
achievements.description: Complete the Intergang Crime Wave operation by defeating Bruno Mannheim and Chang Tzu at the same time, ensuring that neither have a chance to escape

achievements.name: Drop the Weapon!
achievements.description: During the Artifacts from the Past operation, defeat the second subboss at least once for each type of ancient weapon he wields

achievements.name: Null and Void
achievements.description: Defeat the final boss in the League Hall: Security Breach alert after recharging the Nullifier at least 12 times

achievements.name: Let's Get Dangerous
achievements.description: Complete the League Hall: Lockdown raid without your entire team getting knocked out, and while allowing the intruders to create exactly three parts of the makeshift teleporter

achievements.name: Behind Closed Doors
achievements.description: Defeat 20 Dregg Wardens in the Necropolis: Relics of Urgrund raid

achievements.name: Exit Through the Gift Shop
achievements.description: Collect all 9 Artifacts of Urgrund Replica Base Items

achievements.name: In One Piece
achievements.description: During the Love and War operation, delay engaging Impassioned Wonder Woman until after Carol Ferris arrives, then defeat her before Carol Ferris

achievements.name: Teleport of Entry
achievements.description: Complete the Cain Street Mall portion of the Love and War operation after allowing the Star Sapphires to repair each of the three teleporters at least once

achievements.name: Any Which Way But Lose
achievements.description: Defeat Bleez, Furious Metallo, and Vice in every possible order during the Spark of Parallax solo instance

achievements.name: Femme Fatale
achievements.description: Prevent Fatality from releasing any Star Sapphires from crystals during the Zamaron Conversion Chamber alert

achievements.name: Hot Potato
achievements.description: Avoid being hit by Glomulus's Greedy Butthead attack in the Spark of Ion duo

achievements.name: Going Green
achievements.description: Collect any 6 Living Planet Base Items from the War of the Light Part II DLC

achievements.name: Golden Path of Destruction
achievements.description: Complete all of the rooms in the Labyrinth of Lost Souls raid in the most efficient order

achievements.name: Futile Efforts
achievements.description: Never allow Brainiac's forces to activate their teleporters outside his forcefield dome in the Prime Battleground portion of the Return to the Nexus operation

achievements.name: Final Destination
achievements.description: Defeat each stage of the Throne of the Dead raid without any group members getting knocked out

achievements.name: Totally Totem-Free
achievements.description: Defeat 36 Totem Masters before they can place a Totem of Hades during the Throne of the Dead raid

achievements.name: Bring a Dog to Heal
achievements.description: Do not defeat any Creature Handlers during the Cerberus fight in the Halls of Hades raid

achievements.name: Forged in Battle
achievements.description: Avoid the Forge Spirit during the Forge Master fight in the Halls of Hades raid

achievements.name: Fire Hydrant
achievements.description: Defeat 13 Shades by luring them into the Hydra's fire during the Act of Defiance operation

achievements.name: Rockin' the Paradise Island
achievements.description: Collect any 13 Base Items from the Amazon Fury Part II DLC

achievements.name: Parademonic
achievements.description: Complete the Happiness Home raid without successfully completing any of the Parademon side rooms

achievements.name: Death Rays of Sunshine
achievements.description: Complete the Happiness Home raid with 3 of Granny Goodness' terminals active for at least 4 minutes while her prize pupil is active in the fight

achievements.name: Living on the Edge
achievements.description: Do not interact with any Conversion Chamber Control Consoles in the New Genesis Now operation

achievements.name: Perfect Grades
achievements.description: During the Fatal Exams operation, earn a passing grade on each of Granny Goodness' Tests and the Extra Credit in a single run

achievements.name: Extra Credit for Granny
achievements.description: During the Fatal Exams operation, earn Granny Goodness's Extra Credit by disabling all of the energy conduit nodes on the first attempt before Brainwashed Mister Miracle and Brainwashed Big Barda become shielded

achievements.name: Radioactive
achievements.description: Defeat 168 enemies on New Genesis while affected by the Radiation from the environment near the cannonades

achievements.name: New Genesis by Design
achievements.description: Collect any 13 Base Items from the Halls of Power Part II Episode

achievements.name: Indigo Light Shines Bright
achievements.description: Prevent corrupted Zamaron crystals from knocking out Indigo-1 during the final fight in the Corrupted Zamaron duo

achievements.name: No More No Less
achievements.description: During the Bombshell Paradox operation, defeat the Tenebrae Assassins that accompany The Lady al Ghul exactly 9 times before defeating her on the first attempt

achievements.name: Bird Watching
achievements.description: During the Desecrated Cathedral Alert, don't let ally Raven's health ever get below 75% while fighting enemy Raven

achievements.name: Corruption Interruption
achievements.description: Defeat Corrupted T'Larto once without defeating the Corrupted Energy, and once again after defeating 5 Corrupted Energies

achievements.name: Rogue Red Balloons
achievements.description: During the Flash Museum Burglary Duo, pop all of the Flash Museum Balloons that have escaped the souvenir shop

achievements.name: Trigon's Inferno
achievements.description: During the Unholy Matrimony Operation, defeat Trigon without allowing him to gain any Demonic Energy

achievements.name: Banned Book
achievements.description: During the Blackest Day Operation, defeat the second boss without any group members getting KOed by the Book of the Black

achievements.name: Elemental, My Dear
achievements.description: Complete the Demon's Pit Duo, disarming every one of the Nature, Fire, and Storm Alchemist's Bombs before they trigger

achievements.name: Don't Get Gonged
achievements.description: Defeat all of the League Lookouts before they sound the alarms in Nanda Parbat

achievements.name: Not Hungry
achievements.description: Complete the Deep Desires solo instance without getting knocked out

achievements.name: Rock It
achievements.description: In the Wastelands Wonderland Duo, protect the Sentinels and never allow a single Crystal summoning to fail

achievements.name: Mist Fulfillment
achievements.description: During the Blackest Night Operation, defeat Nekron after using the fewest possible Diamond Mist containers to cleanse Nekron's Black Lantern Battery

achievements.name: Security System Sidestep
achievements.description: During the First Piece Operation, defeat the final boss in the museum without either group member being hit by a museum defense security laser

achievements.name: Apes-A-Poppin
achievements.description: During the Prison Break Operation, defeat Gorilla Grodd on the first attempt and only use the Anti-Metahuman activation terminal once

achievements.name: Energizer
achievements.description: During the Science Spire challenge, energize the Central Power Conduit with no more than 4 energy spheres

achievements.name: Nothin' But Chasm
achievements.description: During the Phantom Zone Operation, on the first attempt at the fight, throw all of the Sunstone Crystals into the chasm before the timer expires on any of them, then defeat the Malfunctioning Jor-El A.I.

achievements.name: Healing License Revoked
achievements.description: During The Will of Darkseid Operation, defeat Steppenwolf after defeating at least nine Parademon Fixers

achievements.name: The Digital Age
achievements.description: During the Brainiac's Bottle Ship Operation, defeat Brainiac while General Zod and Supergirl are both under Brainiac's control

achievements.name: Stashed Loot...ed
achievements.description: Locate the suitcases of stashed loot the Joker Goons left behind during Harley's Heist at the Regal Hotel

achievements.name: Omega 13
achievements.description: During the Darkseid's War Factory (Non-Elite) Raid, defeat Darkseid after group members have fallen to Darkseid's Omega Beams exactly thirteen times

achievements.name: Chillin' Like a Villain
achievements.description: Complete the Iceberg Lounge solo instance without getting knocked out

achievements.name: Sack the Vandal
achievements.description: During the A Rip in Time Operation, defeat the final boss in ancient Kahndaq without allowing him to ever utilize his Savage Blast in a single run

achievements.name: Green Thumbs
achievements.description: During the Wayne Manor Gala Duo, defeat the final bosses without disabling any of the hydroponic setups and without allowing any of the hydroponic setups to spawn an enemy by destroying them all before even one of their timers expires

achievements.name: Resistance is Futile
achievements.description: During the Kandor Raid, defeat Domsday without any group member setting off Doomsday's Adaptive Resistance

achievements.name: From Whence They Came
achievements.description: During the Seeing Shades Again Mission, destroy three Portal Anomalies before defeating Faust and then defeat him once again without destroying a single Anomaly

achievements.name: Do You Feel That?
achievements.description: In the Raising Hades Duo, on the first attempt during the Ixion fight, do not knock out Shade minions before all four Braziers are snuffed out, then defeat Ixion.

achievements.name: Phoenix of Vengeance
achievements.description: During the Underworld Trials Alert, defeat Medusa after the Phoenix joins the battle

achievements.name: No Eggsit
achievements.description: During the God of Monsters raid (Non-Elite), defeat Typhon without causing any extra monster eggs to hatch

achievements.name: Bobbing for Golden Apples
achievements.description: During the Olympus Elite Raid, only defeat Zeus after the group eats at least 13 Golden Apples on that attempt

achievements.name: Ultimate Victory
achievements.description: Defeat the Ultimate Soldier in his different states to claim and Ultimate Victory

achievements.name: Dreamland Defender
achievements.description: Complete these feats from the Time-Torn Area 51: Knocking on Death's Door, In the Nick of Time, Paradox Punisher, and The Times They Are A-Changin'

achievements.name: Monkey See Monkey Do
achievements.description: During the Saving Justice Alert, while fighting Ultra-Humanite, complete the boss battle once while never allowing the JSA to be harmed. Then complete the boss battle again while allowing the JSA to be hurt at least twice, but not three times.

achievements.name: Time Master
achievements.description: Complete these feats from the Justice For All Raid: Time Out, Out of Time, and One Out of Time, One at a Time

achievements.name: Fire Safety Test... It Works
achievements.description: During Earth 3: The Visitor (Normal) Duo, in Lex's Office, defeat Alexander Luthor once without getting frozen by the Freezing Trap and once again by being frozen at least one time.

achievements.name: Tick, Tick... Boom!
achievements.description: During the Earth 3: Injustice System (Normal) Alert, don't let any guests at the Gala get blown up in the Owlman Fight.

achievements.name: Ultra-Easy
achievements.description: During Earth 3: The Panopticon (Normal or Elite) Raid, defeat each of the bosses in the 4 minutes or less.

achievements.name: Justice Served, Suddenly
achievements.description: During Earth 3: The Escape (Normal or Elite) Raid, defeat the Final Bosses all within 12 seconds of each other.

achievements.name: Breath Saver
achievements.description: During the Spindrift Raid, drain the flooded room without letting your teammates run out of oxygen.

achievements.name: Temple Throwdown
achievements.description: During the Atlantean Temple portion of the Story Mission (Normal), in a single run, defeat at least 30 enemies that emerge from the moonpools.

achievements.name: Disco Dance Off
achievements.description: During the Titans: H.I.V.E. Base (Normal and Elite), all members must avoid taking any damage from the floor traps.

achievements.name: Exterminator
achievements.description: During the Titans: The Machine Raid (Normal or Elite), defeat 45 Dive Bombers in one run.

achievements.name: If a Tree Falls
achievements.description: During the Atlantis: Silent School (Normal) Alert, in the first boss fight, all Thorn Magi must be hit at least once by the Thorn Golem's Timber attack.

achievements.name: (Sea) Beast Mode
achievements.description: During the Atlantis: The Throne (Elite) Raid, defeat Sea Beast without anyone in the group being picked up and chewed on by the Sea Beast during one attempt at the fight.

achievements.name: On the Nose
achievements.description: During the Atlantis: Crown of Thorns (Elite) Raid, prevent King Shark from using his Feeding Frenzy on your group mates throughout the encounter.

achievements.name: Half Cracked
achievements.description: In the JLD: Shattered Gotham Raid (Normal), reach 50% Madness during the Tala fight and remain above 50% Madness for the rest of the instance.

achievements.name: Book by its Cover
achievements.description: During the JLD: Fellowship of Arcane Light (Event, Normal or Elite) Raid, locate the books: Ebontome (Abridged), Magic for Dum-Dums, Adventures of Alley-Kat-Abra, "Sleight of Hand : dnaH fo thgielS" by Giovanni Zatara, Seances: Beyond the Veil, A History of the Starheart, Cei-U and Other Magic Words, Sargon the Sorcerer's Autobiography, and To Eternity and Beyond.

achievements.name: Leader of the Pack
achievements.description: During the JLD: Darkness Rising (Event or Normal) Alert, defeat 151 werewolves in the European Castle.

achievements.name: Merciful Minerva!
achievements.description: During the False Idols (Normal or Elite) Raid, let Wonder Woman destroy the Drachma with the Sunblade without being interrupted by Amazons or the Merciless.

achievements.name: Crows Barred
achievements.description: During the Monsters of Metal (Normal or Elite) Raid, win the final boss fight only after first defeating at least 13 Dark Robins during that fight.

achievements.name: The Forgemaster Commeth
achievements.description: During the Into the Dark Multiverse (Normal or Elite) Raid, have no one in the group get knocked out during the fight with Forgemaster Hawkman.

achievements.name: Mental Mettle
achievements.description: Complete the following Metal Pt. II: Batscape Duo feats: Mental Guard Part 1, Mental Guard Part 2, Let Your Guard Down, Dark Knightmares, Inner Demon Slayer, Barbat-Toss, and Apparition Abolition

achievements.name: Mirror, Mirror
achievements.description: During the Metal Pt. II: Damage Control (Normal) Alert, in a single run, successfully complete the mirror configuration to blind the Drowned twice.

achievements.name: A Fate Worse Than Death
achievements.description: Defeat Lady Blackhawk in Metal Pt. II: The Phoenix Cannon (Normal or Elite) Raid, without knocking out Lieutenant Thrasher

achievements.name: Save Your Bacon
achievements.description: Defeat Lobo in the LexCorp Tower (Normal) Solo without taking damage from his Spacehog.

achievements.name: Smoldering Survivors
achievements.description: During the BoP: Fire & Brimstone (Elite) Raid, defeat the first boss without anyone having been KOed with the Smoldering Grasping Hand debuff active in a single run of the fight

achievements.name: Don't Stand So Close
achievements.description: Defeat Reprogrammed Oracle-Bot in BoP: The Clock Tower (Normal or Elite) without triggering Exostatic by being too close to another player of the opposite polarity.

achievements.name: Hard No-Core
achievements.description: During Birds of Prey: Volcano Mining Facility (Normal), in the Lex Luthor fight, defeat Lex Luthor without using the power cores from his fallen warsuits.

achievements.name: I'm Not Glue
achievements.description: During Wonderverse: Crypt of Penthesilea (Normal), defeat Queen Diana without anyone having an attack reflected by her Bracer Deflection.

achievements.name: Rainbow Spackling
achievements.description: Complete the following feats in the Temples of Source Power Solos: Brick by Green Brick, Brick by Blue Brick, Brick by Yellow Brick, and Brick by Red Brick.

achievements.name: Superfluid
achievements.description: In the Convergence of Unmaking Raid (Normal or Elite), complete the Eye of Ekron fight without any group members taking damage from Emerald Empress' Emerald Plasma

achievements.name: Hard Headed
achievements.description: In Legion: HQ Orientation Alert (Normal) do not remove any of Evil Cosmic Boy's protective Shields

achievements.name: Temple Runner
achievements.description: During the World of Flashpoint: The Royal War (Normal), defeat the guards at the Temple Entrance in 26 seconds or less

achievements.name: Better Together, Again
achievements.description: During the World of Flashpoint: Flashtastic Voyage (Normal or Elite) Raid, defeat the final bosses within 10 seconds of each other

achievements.name: Kid Flash Forward
achievements.description: Complete the World of Flashpoint: Flash to the Future (Normal) Raid in 9 minutes or less

achievements.name: Construct Combustion
achievements.description: Defeat Ultraviolet Sinestro without taking any damage from his Ultraviolet Construct's Explosions in the Umbrax the Ultraviolet Duo (Normal or Elite)

achievements.name: League Hall of Hard Knocks: The One Who Waits: Batman Who Laughs
achievements.description: Defeat the Batman Who Laughs without using a consumable or Supercharge ability in The One Who Waits (Normal or Elite) Alert

achievements.name: Let's Block It Out
achievements.description: Defeat the World Forger without any players failing to block the Energy of Creation from his anvil in The Sixth Dimension (Normal or Elite) Raid

achievements.name: Runnin' from the Devil
achievements.description: Defeat Brimstone without taking damage from Eruption in New Apokolips Duo (Normal, Elite)

achievements.name: Perpetual Relief (Elite or Elite Plus)
achievements.description: Complete The Source Wall Raid without any players being hit by Planet Strike, Source Energy Burst, or Divine Source Eyebeam (Elite or Elite Plus)

achievements.name: Spore Busters
achievements.description: Defeat Devastotor after players have absorbed 10 Spore Clouds in the Return to Earth 3 Alert

achievements.name: Non-Me-Blast
achievements.description: Defeat Blackfire without any player getting hit by the Omniblast in the Homecoming: Party at Titans Tower Alert

achievements.name: Isis Crisis
achievements.description: Complete these feats in Godseye Pyramid Alert: Monstrosity Mash Pt. I, Monstrosity Mash Pt. II, Orbs Absorbed, Isis Empowered

achievements.name: Unchained Lightning (Normal)
achievements.description: Defeat Black Alice without chaining Chain Lightning to anyone in SoBA: Rock of Eternity (Normal)

achievements.name: Lava Champ (Normal)
achievements.description: Defeat Neron without anyone being burned by lava in SoBA: Neron's Underworld (Normal)

achievements.name: Forget-a-Breed
achievements.description: Abandoned Subway Duo (Normal or Elite): While fighting Turtledove or DaBoom, defeat 80 Metabreed Bang Babies

achievements.name: No Drain No Pain
achievements.description: Meta-Therapy Clinic Alert (Elite): Defeat Parasite after successfully boosting Static with the Static Charge each opportunity to do so

achievements.name: Absorbing Nightmares
achievements.description: The Terrorium Raid (Normal): Defeat DeSaad without allowing any Nightmare Voids to explode

achievements.name: Absorb the Orb
achievements.description: Town Square Theater Solo (Normal): Defeat Cursed Zatanna without taking any damage from her Cursed Glitter Ball attack

achievements.name: Demonic Trickery
achievements.description: Cursed House of Mystery (Event, Normal, or Elite): Pass Etrigan's Puzzle after choosing all four swords

achievements.name: Serenity Now
achievements.description: Cursed Themyscira Raid (Normal): Defeat Ethereal Hecate without allowing Hecate to get a buff from thoughts
